mapper.insert: insert into exemption ( accidentID, subFile, reason, legacy ) values ( #{accidentID}, #{subFile}, #{reason}, #{legacy})
mapper.select: select * from exemption right join accident on exemption.accidentID = accident.accidentID join accidentinfo on exemption.accidentID = accidentInfo.accidentID where exemption.exemptionID is not null and accidentInfo.judged > 0
